Posts.Content: Jan 4, 2016 11:24PM tyvette wrote: Hi Susan, Thank you so much for pointing me in the right direction.
Posts.Title: Found a lump after lumpectomy tyvette tyvette

Posts.Content: tyvette wrote: Diagnosed with DCIS in September had a lumpectomy on November 6, 2015 followed by radiation. Today, I now feel a small lump near the stitch area where the surgery was performed. I am hoping it is scar tissue. Has anyone experienced something like this? Tonia Dx 9/28/2015, DCIS, Left, 1cm, Stage 0, Grade 1 Surgery 11/6/2015 Lumpectomy: Left Radiation Therapy 11/9/2015 Whole-breast: Breast Surgery Lumpectomy: Left Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Found a lump after lumpectomy tyvette tyvette
